properties.entry: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_CAR WHERE STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT MANAGEMENT_NO, STATUS, CAR_NO, LOCATION_NO, LOCATION_NAME, MODEL_NAME, FUEL_NAME, BRAND_NAME, GRADE_NAME, YEAR, GRADE_PRICE, MODEL_PRICE, YEAR_PRICE, ROWNUM RNUM FROM (SELECT MANAGEMENT_NO, STATUS, CAR_NO, LOCATION_NO, LOCATION_NAME, MODEL_NAME, FUEL_NAME, BRAND_NAME, GRADE_NAME, YEAR, GRADE_PRICE, MODEL_PRICE, YEAR_PRICE, ROWNUM RNUM FROM (SELECT C.MANAGEMENT_NO, STATUS, CAR_NO, C.LOCATION_NO, LOCATION_NAME, MODEL_NAME, FUEL_NAME, BRAND_NAME, GRADE_NAME, YEAR, GRADE_PRICE, MODEL_PRICE, YEAR_PRICE FROM TB_CAR C JOIN TB_CAR_BRIDGE CB ON (C.MANAGEMENT_NO = CB.MANAGEMENT_NO) JOIN TB_LOCATION L ON (C.LOCATION_NO = L.LOCATION_NO) JOIN TB_MODEL M ON (CB.MODEL_NO = M.MODEL_NO) JOIN TB_FUEL F ON (CB.FUEL_NO = F.FUEL_NO) JOIN TB_BRAND B ON (CB.BRAND_NO = B.BRAND_NO) JOIN TB_GRADE G ON (CB.GRADE_NO = G.GRADE_NO) JOIN TB_YEAR Y ON (CB.YEAR_NO = Y.YEAR_NO) ORDER BY C.MANAGEMENT_NO)) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT MANAGEMENT_NO, O.OPTION_NO, OPTION_NAME, OPTION_PRICE FROM TB_OPTION O JOIN TB_OPTION_BRIDGE OB ON (O.OPTION_NO = OB.OPTION_NO)
ORDER BY MANAGEMENT_NO

SELECT MANAGEMENT_NO, STATUS, CAR_NO, LOCATION_NO, LOCATION_NAME, MODEL_NAME, FUEL_NAME, BRAND_NAME, GRADE_NAME, YEAR, GRADE_PRICE, MODEL_PRICE, YEAR_PRICE, ROWNUM RNUM FROM (SELECT MANAGEMENT_NO, STATUS, CAR_NO, LOCATION_NO, LOCATION_NAME, MODEL_NAME, FUEL_NAME, BRAND_NAME, GRADE_NAME, YEAR, GRADE_PRICE, MODEL_PRICE, YEAR_PRICE, ROWNUM RNUM FROM (SELECT C.MANAGEMENT_NO, STATUS, CAR_NO, C.LOCATION_NO, LOCATION_NAME, MODEL_NAME, FUEL_NAME, BRAND_NAME, GRADE_NAME, YEAR, GRADE_PRICE, MODEL_PRICE, YEAR_PRICE FROM TB_CAR C LEFT JOIN TB_CAR_BRIDGE CB ON (C.MANAGEMENT_NO = CB.MANAGEMENT_NO) LEFT JOIN TB_LOCATION L ON (C.LOCATION_NO = L.LOCATION_NO) LEFT JOIN TB_MODEL M ON (CB.MODEL_NO = M.MODEL_NO) LEFT JOIN TB_FUEL F ON (CB.FUEL_NO = F.FUEL_NO) LEFT JOIN TB_BRAND B ON (CB.BRAND_NO = B.BRAND_NO) LEFT JOIN TB_GRADE G ON (CB.GRADE_NO = G.GRADE_NO) LEFT JOIN TB_YEAR Y ON (CB.YEAR_NO = Y.YEAR_NO) ORDER BY C.MANAGEMENT_NO)) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_CAR C JOIN TB_LOCATION L ON (C.LOCATION_NO = L.LOCATION_NO) WHERE STATUS = 'Y' AND LOCATION_NAME = ?

SELECT MANAGEMENT_NO, STATUS, CAR_NO, LOCATION_NO, LOCATION_NAME, MODEL_NAME, FUEL_NAME, BRAND_NAME, GRADE_NAME, YEAR, GRADE_PRICE, MODEL_PRICE, YEAR_PRICE FROM (SELECT MANAGEMENT_NO, STATUS, CAR_NO, LOCATION_NO, LOCATION_NAME, MODEL_NAME, FUEL_NAME, BRAND_NAME, GRADE_NAME, YEAR, GRADE_PRICE, MODEL_PRICE, YEAR_PRICE, START_DATE, END_DATE, ROWNUM RNUM FROM (SELECT C.MANAGEMENT_NO, STATUS, CAR_NO, C.LOCATION_NO, LOCATION_NAME, MODEL_NAME, FUEL_NAME, BRAND_NAME, GRADE_NAME, YEAR, GRADE_PRICE, MODEL_PRICE, YEAR_PRICE, START_DATE, END_DATE FROM TB_CAR C JOIN TB_CAR_BRIDGE CB ON (C.MANAGEMENT_NO = CB.MANAGEMENT_NO) JOIN TB_LOCATION L ON (C.LOCATION_NO = L.LOCATION_NO) JOIN TB_MODEL M ON (CB.MODEL_NO = M.MODEL_NO) JOIN TB_FUEL F ON (CB.FUEL_NO = F.FUEL_NO) JOIN TB_BRAND B ON (CB.BRAND_NO = B.BRAND_NO) JOIN TB_GRADE G ON (CB.GRADE_NO = G.GRADE_NO) JOIN TB_YEAR Y ON (CB.YEAR_NO = Y.YEAR_NO) LEFT JOIN TB_RESERVATION R ON (C.MANAGEMENT_NO = R.MANAGEMENT_NO) WHERE LOCATION_NAME = ? AND MANAGEMENT_NO NOT IN (SELECT C.MANAGEMENT_NO FROM TB_CAR C JOIN TB_RESERVATION R ON (C.MANAGEMENT_NO = R.MANAGEMENT_NO) WHERE TO_CHAR(START_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') <= ? AND TO_CHAR(END_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') >= ?) ORDER BY C.MANAGEMENT_NO)) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ? AND STATUS = 'Y' GROUP BY MANAGEMENT_NO, STATUS, CAR_NO, LOCATION_NO, LOCATION_NAME, MODEL_NAME, FUEL_NAME, BRAND_NAME, GRADE_NAME, YEAR, GRADE_PRICE, MODEL_PRICE, YEAR_PRICE
INSERT INTO TB_RESERVATION VALUES ( SEQ_RESERVATION_NO.NEXTVAL, TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI'), TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI'), ?, ?, ? )

SELECT C.MANAGEMENT_NO, STATUS, CAR_NO, C.LOCATION_NO, LOCATION_NAME, MODEL_NAME, FUEL_NAME, BRAND_NAME, GRADE_NAME, YEAR, GRADE_PRICE, MODEL_PRICE, YEAR_PRICE FROM TB_CAR C JOIN TB_CAR_BRIDGE CB ON (C.MANAGEMENT_NO = CB.MANAGEMENT_NO) JOIN TB_LOCATION L ON (C.LOCATION_NO = L.LOCATION_NO) JOIN TB_MODEL M ON (CB.MODEL_NO = M.MODEL_NO) JOIN TB_FUEL F ON (CB.FUEL_NO = F.FUEL_NO) JOIN TB_BRAND B ON (CB.BRAND_NO = B.BRAND_NO) JOIN TB_GRADE G ON (CB.GRADE_NO = G.GRADE_NO) JOIN TB_YEAR Y ON (CB.YEAR_NO = Y.YEAR_NO) WHERE C.MANAGEMENT_NO = ?
SELECT MANAGEMENT_NO, O.OPTION_NO, OPTION_NAME, OPTION_PRICE FROM TB_OPTION O JOIN TB_OPTION_BRIDGE OB ON (O.OPTION_NO = OB.OPTION_NO) WHERE MANAGEMENT_NO = ?

SELECT MANAGEMENT_NO, STATUS, CAR_NO, C.LOCATION_NO, LOCATION_NAME, MODEL_NAME, FUEL_NAME, BRAND_NAME, GRADE_NAME, YEAR, GRADE_PRICE, MODEL_PRICE, YEAR_PRICE, START_DATE, END_DATE, MM.MEMBER_ID, RESERVATION_NO, MM.MEMBER_NAME, MM.PHONE, MM.EMAIL FROM TB_CAR C JOIN TB_CAR_BRIDGE CB ON (C.MANAGEMENT_NO = CB.MANAGEMENT_NO) JOIN TB_LOCATION L ON (C.LOCATION_NO = L.LOCATION_NO) JOIN TB_MODEL M ON (CB.MODEL_NO = M.MODEL_NO) JOIN TB_FUEL F ON (CB.FUEL_NO = F.FUEL_NO) JOIN TB_BRAND B ON (CB.BRAND_NO = B.BRAND_NO) JOIN TB_GRADE G ON (CB.GRADE_NO = G.GRADE_NO) JOIN TB_YEAR Y ON (CB.YEAR_NO = Y.YEAR_NO) JOIN TB_RESERVATION R ON (C.MANAGEMENT_NO = R.MANAGEMENT_NO) LEFT JOIN TB_MEMBER MM ON (R.MEMBER_NO = MM.MEMBER_NO) WHERE EXTRACT ( MONTH FROM START_DATE) = EXTRACT (MONTH FROM SYSDATE) AND EXTRACT ( YEAR FROM START_DATE) = EXTRACT (YEAR FROM SYSDATE)

SELECT MANAGEMENT_NO, STATUS, CAR_NO, LOCATION_NAME, C.LOCATION_NO, MODEL_NAME, FUEL_NAME, BRAND_NAME, GRADE_NAME, YEAR, GRADE_PRICE, MODEL_PRICE, YEAR_PRICE, START_DATE, END_DATE, MM.MEMBER_ID, RESERVATION_NO, MM.MEMBER_NAME, MM.PHONE, MM.EMAIL FROM TB_CAR C JOIN TB_CAR_BRIDGE CB ON (C.MANAGEMENT_NO = CB.MANAGEMENT_NO) JOIN TB_LOCATION L ON (C.LOCATION_NO = L.LOCATION_NO) JOIN TB_MODEL M ON (CB.MODEL_NO = M.MODEL_NO) JOIN TB_FUEL F ON (CB.FUEL_NO = F.FUEL_NO) JOIN TB_BRAND B ON (CB.BRAND_NO = B.BRAND_NO) JOIN TB_GRADE G ON (CB.GRADE_NO = G.GRADE_NO) JOIN TB_YEAR Y ON (CB.YEAR_NO = Y.YEAR_NO) JOIN TB_RESERVATION R ON (C.MANAGEMENT_NO = R.MANAGEMENT_NO) LEFT JOIN TB_MEMBER MM ON (R.MEMBER_NO = MM.MEMBER_NO) WHERE EXTRACT ( MONTH FROM START_DATE) = EXTRACT (MONTH FROM SYSDATE) AND EXTRACT ( YEAR FROM START_DATE) = EXTRACT (YEAR FROM SYSDATE) AND RESERVATION_NO = ?

SELECT MANAGEMENT_NO, STATUS, CAR_NO, LOCATION_NAME, C.LOCATION_NO, MODEL_NAME, FUEL_NAME, BRAND_NAME, GRADE_NAME, YEAR, GRADE_PRICE, MODEL_PRICE, YEAR_PRICE, START_DATE, END_DATE, MM.MEMBER_ID, RESERVATION_NO, MM.MEMBER_NAME, MM.PHONE, MM.EMAIL
FROM TB_CAR C JOIN TB_CAR_BRIDGE CB ON (C.MANAGEMENT_NO = CB.MANAGEMENT_NO) JOIN TB_LOCATION L ON (C.LOCATION_NO = L.LOCATION_NO) JOIN TB_MODEL M ON (CB.MODEL_NO = M.MODEL_NO) JOIN TB_FUEL F ON (CB.FUEL_NO = F.FUEL_NO) JOIN TB_BRAND B ON (CB.BRAND_NO = B.BRAND_NO) JOIN TB_GRADE G ON (CB.GRADE_NO = G.GRADE_NO) JOIN TB_YEAR Y ON (CB.YEAR_NO = Y.YEAR_NO) JOIN TB_RESERVATION R ON (C.MANAGEMENT_NO = R.MANAGEMENT_NO) LEFT JOIN TB_MEMBER MM ON (R.RESERVATION_NO = MM.MEMBER_NO) WHERE EXTRACT ( MONTH FROM START_DATE) = EXTRACT (MONTH FROM SYSDATE) AND EXTRACT ( YEAR FROM START_DATE) = EXTRACT (YEAR FROM SYSDATE) AND MODEL_NAME = ?
